events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the product and get a refund as it does not meet my expectations.
The customer has requested a refund due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning this refund request to the returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I am here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the product?
My order number is 123456789. The product is not as described on the website, and it doesn’t work properly.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you send the product back through our prepaid return shipping label.
That sounds good, I will send the package back today and provide you with the tracking number.
We have received your returned product and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to show.
Just checking in to ensure your refund has been received properly and if you need any further assistance.
We’re closing this case now. If you have any more questions or issues, don’t hesitate to contact us again.
